definition: secret service/special service/secret service agent/special agent
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: The spy is shy of tsimilarg shelter on the shelf of the shell-like shed.
sentences.chinese: 特工怕在壳子一样的棚里的架子上居住。

sentences.english: Synopsis: An amnesiac spy awakens in a world overrun by zombies.
sentences.chinese: 一个记忆缺失的特工在一个僵尸遍野的世界苏醒。

sentences.english: The line was connected to a harness in which the agent was strapped.
sentences.chinese: 那条线连到固定住特工的安全带上。

sentences.english: "I hate this person, " he told the agent.
sentences.chinese: “我讨厌这个人”，他告诉这个特工。

sentences.english: Anne, have you ever seen the movie G-Force?
sentences.chinese: 安妮，你看过豚鼠特工队吗？

sentences.english: A security detail shadowed me whenever I left the room.
sentences.chinese: 每次我离开房间时候，都有安保特工在监视。

sentences.english: "You've got to stay right here, Special Agent Bauer," Chappelle said evenly.
sentences.chinese: 你必须呆在这儿，鲍尔特工。

sentences.english: Helm says the women ended up doing much more than this, though.
sentences.chinese: 赫尔姆说，实际上，女特工所作的工作远远不止这些。

sentences.english: He comes to the inaccurate conclusion that he must be a superspy like Jason Bourne.
sentences.chinese: 他模糊地记得自己一定是像杰森伯恩一样的超级特工。

sentences.english: Bellick changed his identity into a FBI agent soon.
sentences.chinese: 贝里克很快就把他的身份换成了联邦特工。

sentences.english: The five agents are encased in body armor and are toting semiautomatic weapons.
sentences.chinese: 五个身着防弹衣的特工手持半自动武器。

sentences.english: Most of the unit's soldiers are tactical counterintelligence agents.
sentences.chinese: 这支部队的大多数士兵都是战术反情报的特工。

sentences.english: Fache never flinched, his eyes riveted on the second agent.
sentences.chinese: 法希毫不畏缩，他的眼睛一动不动地注视着那名特工。

sentences.english: PUBLISHING the names of serving spies is a huge taboo in the intelligence world.
sentences.chinese: 公布间谍特工的姓名在情报界往往被视为一大禁忌。

sentences.english: One operative referred to the scheme as “the big lie.
sentences.chinese: 一名特工将这一阴谋称之为“弥天大谎”。

sentences.english: Ms. Lee entered on duty with the FBI as a special agent in 1986.
sentences.chinese: 1986年，李作为一名特工进入联邦调查局。

definition: US Central Intelligence Agency, CIA/abbr. for 中央情報局|中央情报局[Zhong1 yang1 Qing2 bao4 ju2]
to hide (as an undercover agent)/an insider (in a gang of thieves)/a mole
KGB (Soviet secret police)/member of the KGB
